events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred yesterday at an intersection causing significant vehicle damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following review of the incident details and preliminary notes.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to manage the investigation and guide the customer through the process.
Confirmation sent to the customer acknowledging receipt of the claim and initiating the standard processing timeline.
Request sent for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and a copy of the driver’s license to proceed with claim evaluation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos, accident report, and insurance policy details promptly.
Investigation has begun to verify circumstances of the collision and assess liability based on evidence and reports.
Investigation completed with findings supporting the customer’s claim; accident was caused by a third-party driver.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on repair estimates and policy coverage, sent to customer for review.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with claims handling process.
Approval granted for the settlement amount and assigned payment to be processed in accordance with policy terms.
Payment has been issued to the customer’s bank account for the approved claim settlement as per the agreement.
The claim file has been officially closed following successful payment and confirmation of claim resolution.
All documentation and records related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
